Package org.patrodyne.scripting.java

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScriptReader
    An interface to abstract the method used to load the Java source script into a string.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Execute
    Execute a program using the JavaCode script engine.
    JavaCodeScriptEngine
    This is script engine for Java programming language.
    JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory
    This is script engine factory for a "Java" script engine.
    JavaCompiler
    Simple interface to Java compiler using JSR 199 Compiler API.
    MemoryClassLoader
    An extension of URLClassLoader to store and load classes from memory.
    MemoryJavaFileManager<FM extends JavaFileManager>
    This class is a JavaFileManager to store compiled byte code in a memory map.
